alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 9:39PM EST until further notice by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Butler, Ohio and Muhlenberg Counties. .Heavy rain from the past 24 hours will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 17.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. At 24.0 feet, KY 1117 floods near Mining City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The last reported stage of the river was 14.2 feet early Saturday morning. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 22.8 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tomorrow morning.
